```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(purrr)
library(stringr)
library(here)
library(reactable)
library(htmltools)
library(knitr)
library(rmarkdown)
source(here::here("scripts", "reactable_function.R"))
```

```{r load data, include=FALSE, echo = FALSE}

fielding <- read_csv(here::here("data", "fielding_detailed.csv"))
keeping <- read_csv(here::here("data", "keeping_detailed.csv"))
```

```{r process}
fielding_summary <- fielding %>%
  filter(Team == "The Nutty Cuckoo Super Kings") %>%
  group_by(Id, FirstName, LastName, Team) %>%
  select(Id:RunOuts, Team) %>%
  summarise(across(where(is.double), sum)) %>%
  arrange(desc(Catches)) %>%
  select(-Team)

keeping_summary <- keeping %>%
  filter(Team == "The Nutty Cuckoo Super Kings") %>%
  mutate(Innings = 1) %>%
  group_by(Id, FirstName, LastName, Team) %>%
  select(Id:Byes, Team, Innings) %>%
  summarise(across(where(is.double), sum)) %>%
  mutate(Dismissals = Catches + Stumpings) %>%
  arrange(desc(Dismissals)) %>%
  select(-Team)

```
```{r}
div(class = "box-score",
  div(class = "box-score-title", "Fielding"),
  reactable_function(fielding_summary, "fielding"),
  div(class = "box-score-title", "Keeping"),
  reactable_function(keeping_summary, "keeping"),
)
```
